text: "Steering wheel leather peeling after 6 months of use"
"Leather on Steering Wheel has discolored & faded!!"
"steering wheel has deep scratches n cracks on leather"
"ABS Sensor FAILURE triggered warning light on dash board"
"Brake pedal is unusually stiff & hard to press"
"Brake pads wear out faster than expected??"
"Seatbelt stitching coming off near anchor point."
"air conditioning blows warm air instead of cold"
